__e: Wait, what the hell's the deal with Mom and Dad, man?

I don't want to put an old soldier like you in jail, but damn it, this scheme of yours is crazy.
But he messed up and you took him out so he wouldn't reveal your set-up here.
That part of what I do, you never want to find out about.
